member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadEditor.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadEditor.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes (such as a rebuilding layout pass) call .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadEditor.PathToHelperXap
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to helper xap.
member.remarks: RadEditor requires that the RadEditorHelper.xap file is deployed to the web project. If you place the RadEditorHelper.xap file in the ClientBin directory you do not need to specify a value for the PathToHelperXap property. If you place the file on some other place - specify the path.
